name: Fel Defender
description:
The cooldown of 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Blur - Blur</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Fiery Brand</dynamic>

 is reduced by <dynamic>5 sec</dynamic>.

name: Viscous Ink
description:
Demonic Wards 

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>also - also</dynamic>

reduces magic damage taken by 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>an additional</dynamic>

<dynamic>8%</dynamic>.

name: Shattered Restoration
description: The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Felfire Haste
description:
<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Fel Rush</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Infernal Strike</dynamic>

 increases your movement speed by <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> for 8 sec.

name: Ravenous Consumption
description: Consume Magic has a <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic> chance to remove a second beneficial Magic effect from the target.

name: Demonic Parole
description: Enemies that leave your Imprison have their movement speed reduced by 50% for <dynamic>5.0 sec - 20 sec</dynamic>.

name: Lost in Darkness
description: Spectral Sight lasts an additional <dynamic>3 sec - 10 sec</dynamic> if disrupted by attacking or taking damage.

name: Demon's Touch
description: Demon's Bite increases the damage of other abilities by <dynamic>3% - 10%</dynamic>.

name: Dancing with Fate
description: Blade Dance has a <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> chance to apply Essence Break.

name: Serrated Glaive
description: Enemies hit by Throw Glaive take <dynamic>8.0% - 15%</dynamic> increased damage from Eye Beam.

name: Growing Inferno
description: Immolation Aura's damage increases by <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> each time it deals damage.

name: Soul Furnace
description: Every 10 Soul Fragments you consume increases the damage of your next Soul Cleave by <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic>.

name: Demon Muzzle
description: When Sigil of Silence's effect ends, affected enemies deal <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> reduced magic damage to you for 6 sec.

name: Roaring Fire
description: Fel Devastation heals you for up to <dynamic>30% - 45%</dynamic> more, based on your missing health.

name: Repeat Decree
description: Elysian Decree echoes a second sigil 1 second later for <dynamic>45% - 32.73%</dynamic> damage.

name: Increased Scrutiny
description: Reduce the cooldown of Sinful Brand by <dynamic>1 sec - 15 sec</dynamic>.

name: Brooding Pool
description: Increases the duration of Fodder to the Flame by <dynamic>5 sec - 20 sec</dynamic>.

name: Unnatural Mailce
description: Increase the damage of The Hunt's strike against its primary target by <dynamic>20% - 48%</dynamic>.
